column4: Hi, just dropped in to say that the Ubuntu Hardy WLAN is useless on T41 thinkpads (and the whole series I beleive) due to change in wireless drivers
thanks for sharing that
bye
really - WLAN has became very unreliable
ok - bye
or do you have a problem you want to discuss rather than just rant
no you don't. If you want to chat about it, lets discuss it, if you want to rant "hi just dropped in to say ubuntu on a T41 sucks" don't bother
and otherwise Ubuntu on a T41 pretty much ruulz
pretty damn crazy to ship borked drivers for the LTS release
they are not "borked" your having an issue
actually it is - reports are flooding
where ?
The Internet?
can you show me a bug report for these flooding in reports
please show me a bug report
how many would you like?
http://bernaard.iceleaf.net/welcome-ubuntu-804-lts-but-what-happened-to-ipw/
thats someones website, thats not a bug report, nor is that "mass reports"
https://launchpad.net/+search?field.text=hardy+ipw
thats a ipw2220 search - not a bug report,
was Linus refering to you about the wanking walruses?
